name: Broken Souls (Xenix Dev)
description:
This game is made entirely of Unity Particle System (the only exception is text).

You seem to be the one of the most powerful souls in this universe, but not everyone has luck just like you...

Controls:

  • WASD / arrow keys - moving
  • SPACE - interaction
  • R - destroy 1 soul (not mentioned in the tutorial, to be fixed)

Since it's game made upon challenge, let me know if I should continue developing this. Thanks ♥
